title: cosmetic
description: Defines a single, particular visualization for an entity.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

duration.description: Number of turns this cosmetic will last. Default duration of -1 describes a permanent effect.

id.description: Unique id for a particular instance of this type.

name.description: Unique name for this type of cosmetic.

value.description: It is assumed that most comsetics will suffice with a simple, string encoded value
